==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かく|のう|よう|き|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かくのうようき|格納|tr1=kakunō|t1=storage|容器|tr2=yōki|t2=container, vessel}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かくのう ようき}}

# A [[containment]] [[vessel]], as in a [[nuclear reactor]]: a large [[container]] or [[containment building]] intended to [[isolate]] its contents from the outside.

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|格納容器スプレー系|かくのう ようき スプレー けい}}: A [[containment]] [[spray]] system, designed to cool and reduce pressure in a containment vessel.
* {{ja-r|原子炉格納容器|げんしろ かくのう ようき}}: A [[nuclear reactor]] containment vessel or containment [[building]].
